parameters.name: loc
parameters.description: A pointer to the location that you want to add a value to.

parameters.name: incr
parameters.description: The number that you want to add.

full_content:
Function: atomic_add
URL: https://www.qnx.com/developers/docs/7.1/com.qnx.doc.neutrino.lib_ref/topic/a/atomic_add.html
Synopsis: void atomic_add( volatile unsigned * loc,
Headers: #include <atomic.h>
Parameters:
  - loc: A pointer to the location that you want to add a value to.
  - incr: The number that you want to add.
Examples:
Example 1:
#include <atomic.h>

void atomic_add( volatile unsigned * loc,
                 unsigned incr );
Example 2:
#include <atomic.h>
â¦

volatile unsigned count;
â¦

atomic_add( &count, 1 );
